result.eng: We will be hugely thankful to you.
result.ga: Beidh muid thar a bheith buíoch díot
result.orig: Beidh muid thar a bheith buíoch díot
result.html: Beidh muid thar a bheith buíoch díotWe will be hugely thankful to you.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ muid ṫar a ḃeiṫ buíoċ díotWe will be hugely thankful to you.

result.ga: Bhí an bia thar a bheith blasta
result.orig: Bhí an bia thar a bheith blasta
result.html: Bhí an bia thar a bheith blastaThe food was very tasty.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an bia ṫar a ḃeiṫ blastaThe food was very tasty.

result.eng: She went overseas looking for work.
result.ga: Chuaigh sí thar lear ag lorg oibre
result.orig: Chuaigh sí thar lear ag lorg oibre
result.html: Chuaigh sí thar lear ag lorg oibreShe went overseas looking for work.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ sí ṫar lear ag lorg oibreShe went overseas looking for work.

result.html: Léim sé thar an bhallaHe jumped over the wall.
result.ponchtml: Léim sé ṫar an ḃallaHe jumped over the wall.

result.eng: If you forgive me, I'll never disobey your advice again.
result.ga: Má mhaitheann tú dom é ní rachaidh mé thar do chomhairle go deo arís
result.orig: Má mhaitheann tú dom é ní rachaidh mé thar do chomhairle go deo arís
result.html: Má mhaitheann tú dom é ní rachaidh mé thar do chomhairle go deo arísIf you forgive me, I'll never disobey your advice again.
result.ponchtml: Má ṁaiṫeann tú dom é ní raċaiḋ mé ṫar do ċoṁairle go deo arísIf you forgive me, I'll never disobey your advice again.

result.ga: Tá siad ina gcónaí thar lear
result.orig: Tá siad ina gcónaí thar lear
result.html: Tá siad ina gcónaí thar learThey live overseas.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ina gcónaí ṫar learThey live overseas.

result.html: Beidh sé sin thar cionnThat will be excellent.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ sé sin ṫar cionnThat will be excellent.

result.eng: I like the sea a lot.
result.ga: Taitníonn an fharraige thar cionn liom
result.orig: Taitníonn an fharraige thar cionn liom
result.html: Taitníonn an fharraige thar cionn liomI like the sea a lot.
result.ponchtml: Taitníonn an ḟarraige ṫar cionn liomI like the sea a lot.

result.eng: The reason why I am interested in this question more than other questions is because it concerns me personally.
result.ga: Is é fáth mo shuime sa cheist seo thar cheisteanna eile ná go mbaineann sí liom go pearsanta
result.orig: Is é fáth mo shuime sa cheist seo thar cheisteanna eile ná go mbaineann sí liom go pearsanta
result.html: Is é fáth mo shuime sa cheist seo thar cheisteanna eile ná go mbaineann sí liom go pearsantaThe reason why I am interested in this question more than other questions is because it concerns me personally.
result.ponchtml: Is é fáṫ mo ẛuime sa ċeist seo ṫar ċeisteanna eile ná go mbaineann sí liom go pearsantaThe reason why I am interested in this question more than other questions is because it concerns me personally.

result.html: Tá mé thar chomhairle anoisI am beyond advice now.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ṫar ċoṁairle anoisI am beyond advice now.
